news_title: Fusaka Goes Live: Ethereum Cuts Layer-2 Fees by Up to 60 %
news_subtitle: Ethereum activated the Fusaka upgrade today, reducing transaction costs on Layer-2 networks by roughly 40 % to 60 %. Fusaka is live on Ethereum mainnet!– PeerDAS now unlocks 8x data throughput for rollups– UX improvements via the R1 curve & pre-confirmatons– Prep for scaling the ...

news_title: Ethereum’s Biggest Month Yet: 29 New Launches Signal a Rapidly Expanding Ecosystem
news_subtitle: Ethereum has just wrapped up one of its most active months to date, delivering 29 launches, upgrades, and ecosystem milestones in a single stretch. The cycle began with the Fusaka upgrade on December 3rd, introducing 13 new EIPs that improved blob capacity, enhanced user experien...

news_title: WisdomTree Launches Europe’s First Fully Staked Ethereum ETP Holding Lido stETH
news_subtitle: WisdomTree has introduced a major milestone for Ethereum investment products in Europe with the launch of the WisdomTree Physical Lido Staked Ether ETP (LIST). The product, which went live on December 4, 2025, is the first European ETP backed entirely by Lido’s stETH, giving inve...

news_title: Fusaka Sparks ETH Frenzy as Buyer Aggression Reaches 4-Month High
news_subtitle: Analysts say a break above 1.0 in the buy/sell ratio could launch Ethereum toward the $3,500 to $4,000 level.
